title: configuration data
extract: Configuration data is data that is defined in a hashtable and passed to a DSC configuration when you compile that configuration. For a detailed description of the ConfigurationData hashtable, see Using configuration data.Jun 11, 2017
extract_html: Configuration data is data that is defined in a hashtable and passed to a DSC configuration when you compile that configuration. For a detailed description of the ConfigurationData hashtable, see Using configuration data.Jun 11, 2017
